definition: minister who has given outstanding service
state official or subject in dynastic China/I, your servant (used in addressing the sovereign)/Kangxi radical 131
outstanding founding minister (title given to reward loyal general or vassal of new dynasty or state)

sentences.english: Junichi Inamoto was one of the major reasons for Japan's journey to the second round.
sentences.chinese: 稻本润一是日本队能进入第二轮比赛的主要功臣之一。

sentences.english: The toast of the Chinese team was defender Liu Ailing.
sentences.chinese: 这次比赛的功臣是后卫刘爱玲。

sentences.english: Hate the sin but not the blackmailer.
sentences.chinese: 可恨的是罪恶而非功臣。

sentences.english: Junichi Inamoto was one of the major reasons for Japan’s journey to the second round.
sentences.chinese: 稻本润一是日本队能进入第二轮比赛的主要功臣之一。

sentences.english: During the initial stage of the Han Empire, the Military Meritocracy is the pedestal of the government.
sentences.chinese: 汉初功臣集团是西汉最初的统治基础。

sentences.english: De Laet reserved a special final mention for fellow young gun and Reds' match-winner Darron Gibson.
sentences.chinese: 德莱特特别提到了他的队友，曼联获胜的功臣吉布森。

sentences.english: And I am deemed responsible for it.
He was one of the main actoris of this magnificient win.
sentences.chinese: 他是这场伟大胜利的主要功臣之一。

sentences.english: Mr. Li is not only the school's benefactor, but also our savior .
sentences.chinese: 李先生不但是学校的功臣，并且是我们的救命恩人。

sentences.english: They had a domestic working families, give live together after the hero.
sentences.chinese: 他们原出本地正户，赐给功臣后集中居住。

sentences.english: Sawa hero is taking the Golden Boot and Golden Globe.
sentences.chinese: 功臣泽穗希则包揽了金靴奖和金球奖。

sentences.english: The Chinese consumer has become the star in this business’ growth story.
sentences.chinese: 中国消费者已经成为百胜业绩增长中的头号功臣。

sentences.english: The death of Zhou Ya-Fu was the tragic sign of the end of the Milita…
sentences.chinese: 周亚夫之死，就是功臣集团的落幕悲歌。

sentences.english: Which former treble winner celebrates his birthday today?
sentences.chinese: 哪位曾经的三冠王功臣今天过生日？

definition: achievement/meritorious deed/contributions (for the good of society)
outstanding founding minister (title given to reward loyal general or vassal of new dynasty or state)
lit. reputation will go down in history (idiom); fig. achievements will earn eternal glory
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
variant of 開國元勳|开国元勋, founding figure (of country or dynasty)/founding father/fig. also used of company, school etc
founding figure (of a country or dynasty)/founding father/fig. also used of company or school etc
to put in an important position
